publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3632 Bruce Crawford: Pollution of Scotland's Seasâ€”That the Parliament supports the Irish Government, on the occasion of the meeting of the British-Irish Council at New Lanark, in its legal case against the UK Government in regard to nuclear pollution from the British Nuclear Fuels Ltd site at Sellafield, England.
S1M-3632 Pollution of Scotland's Seas (lodged on 22 November 2002) Alex Neil*, Brian Adam*
